articles.title: Ari Aster made a movie about polarized America. ‘Eddington’ has been polarizing - AP News
articles.description: Ari Aster's “Eddington,” appropriately enough, has been divisive. Since its premiere at the Cannes Film Festival in May, Aster’s film has one of the most polarizing releases of the year. “Eddington” releases in theaters Friday and may be the most prominent Am…
articles.content:
NEW YORK (AP) A Post-it note sat near Ari Aster while he wrote Eddington: Remember the phones.
Eddington may be set during the pandemic, but the onset of COVID-19 isnt its inciting incident. Outside… [+6958 chars]
